tool_description: Private API for sending reloads, getting recharge vouchers and logging in merchants.
name: SmartPay - Mobile
title: SmartPay - Mobile

api_list.name: Merchant

required_parameters.name: merchant_password
required_parameters.description: Password of the merchant. Sample test value: 1

api_list.name: Voucher

required_parameters.name: provider
required_parameters.description: Voucher Provider ID. Sample test value: 1

api_list.name: Reload

required_parameters.name: provider
required_parameters.description: Reload provider ID. Sample test value: 1

required_parameters.name: mobile_number
required_parameters.description: Number of the mobile phone that the reload should be sent to.  Sample test value: 0771061508
